TENEO_ENGINE_URL.description: Please input your Teneo Engine URL. https://some.engine/instance/

LOCALE.description: Optional language code. Used for things like the placeholder text in the input box. Defaults to 'en' if left blank.

MS_COGNITIVE_SUBSCRIPTION_KEY.description: Subscription key to Microsoft Cognitive services to power ASR and TTS

MS_COGNITIVE_CUSTOM_AUTH_TOKEN_URL.description: Microsoft Cognitive serivces custom URL to obtain the authorization token from (optional, if you want to overwrite the one based on region)

MS_COGNITIVE_USE_DIRECT_SUBSCRIPTION.description: Indicates if the step to obtain the MS auth token should be skipped and subscription key should be used directly

MS_COGNITIVE_ENDPOINT.description: Microsoft Cognitive serivces non-standard endpoint (including if the endpoint is standard, but it is using additional parameters)

MS_COGNITIVE_HOST.description: Microsoft Cognitive serivces host. Format is 'protocol://host:port' where ':port' is optional. Standard resource path will be assumed.
